issue.title: [Dev] Use --password-stdin for docker login from archery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8698](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8698). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Use --password-stdin, otherwise they'll leak in the process argv via ps/top/etc and you won't need the next exception re-raising.
